system.description: Effect: While worn as an Accessory, the user maintains a Pendulum Clock, 6 Spans in size. Each time the user resolves the same specific attack between consecutive Activations, tick the Clock 1 Span. For each each filled Span on the Clock, that attack's Power increased by 20%, up to a max increase of 100%. This boost this Item gives resets if the user is switched out, @Affliction[fainted], combat ends, or the user declares a different attack.
